= add the right url is very important =
{{{
    $.ajax({
        type: "POST",
        url: "/EPL/Default/sendm",
        data: "name=" + n + "&mail=" + m + "&body=" + b,
        success: function (msg) {
            alert(msg);
            cl('mailform');
        },
        error: function (XmlHttpRequest, textStatus, errorThrown) {
             document.write(XmlHttpRequest.responseText);
        }
    });
}}}
